chunks.zh:
# 二月份 LPR 出炉
据央行官网，2024 年 2 月 1 年期贷款市场报价利率（ LPR ）报 3.45%，上月为 3.45%； 5 年期以上 LPR 报 3.95%，上月为 4.2%。
# 后续影响与目前状况是什么？
V 友们怎么看待这件事
chunks.en:
# February LPR Released
According to the official website of the People's Bank of China, the one-year loan prime rate (LPR) for February 2024 is 3.45%, the same as last month; the LPR for over 5 years is 3.95%, down from 4.2% last month.
# What are the subsequent impacts and current situation?
How do V friends view this?

chunks.zh: 降得太慢，力度还是不够。明明该进 ICU 了，还在门诊晃悠。
chunks.en: The rate cut is too slow, and the intensity is still insufficient. It should obviously be in the ICU, but it's still wandering around in the outpatient clinic.

chunks.zh: @nikola11 😅不可能的
chunks.en: @nikola11 😅Impossible

chunks.zh: 年前不降 ，现在调整只对新房有效了，存量还得等一年，降都降了还不痛快
chunks.en: It didn't drop before the Spring Festival. Now the adjustment is only effective for new houses. The stock has to wait another year. It's not satisfying even though it's been cut.

chunks.zh: @Troevil 不是的，我是选择贷款日降利息的 https://springwood.me/china-house-loan-rate-down/
chunks.en: @Troevil No, I chose the loan date to reduce the interest rate https://springwood.me/china-house-loan-rate-down/

chunks.zh: 1. 压力给到了公积金利率2. 存款利率又要降了
chunks.en: 1. Pressure is put on the housing provident fund interest rate. 2. Deposit interest rates are going to be lowered again.

chunks.zh: 今年还会再降几次，3 以内有可能
chunks.en: It will be cut several more times this year, possibly within 3.

chunks.zh: 刚搞完商转公，我不申请它不降是吧……
chunks.en: I just finished converting a commercial loan to a public fund loan, so if I don't apply, it won't be lowered, right...

chunks.zh: @Vvictor 再不快速降下去，一起崩盘
chunks.en: @Vvictor If the rate is not lowered quickly, everything will collapse together.

chunks.zh: 100 贷款，30 年省了 5w ，继续加油
chunks.en: 100 loan, saved 50,000 in 30 years, keep it up.

chunks.zh: 你不买，我不买，还能降
chunks.en: If you don't buy, I don't buy, the rate can still be lowered.

chunks.zh: @Troevil #8 不是按照你贷款日期满一年后按照这个实行吗
chunks.en: @Troevil #8 Isn't it implemented after one year from your loan date?

chunks.zh: @Troevil 不是每个人都是 1 月 1 号的，很多是发放贷款那个月，比如我 5 月还是我一直的观点：国家层面狂救房地产，救不救得起来我不知道。
chunks.en: @Troevil Not everyone is January 1st, many are the month the loan is issued, like me in May. My consistent view is: the state is desperately trying to save real estate, whether it can be saved or not, I don't know.

chunks.zh: @belin520 但是大多数人都是 1 月 1 号
chunks.en: @belin520 But most people are January 1st

chunks.zh: 预测一波，5 月 3.7 ，10 月 3.45 ，之后至少 26 年前不再降
chunks.en: Predicting, 3.7 in May, 3.45 in October, and no more reductions before at least 2026.

chunks.zh: @naminokoe 大部分都选不了的，都是 1 月 1 日
chunks.en: @naminokoe Most can't choose and are January 1st

chunks.zh: 我的贷款是每个月重新定价的，下个月就能享受新的利率了
chunks.en: My loan is repriced every month, and I can enjoy the new interest rate next month.

chunks.zh: @Troevil #15 大部分都是贷款发放日现在，看了下还款计划，刚好 21 号赶上，还款金额已经少了
chunks.en: @Troevil #15 Most are the loan disbursement date now. I looked at the repayment plan and it happened to be on the 21st, and the repayment amount is already less.

chunks.zh: @R18 什么银行分享一下
chunks.en: @R18 Share which bank

chunks.zh: @EchoWhale 兴业银行
chunks.en: @EchoWhale Industrial Bank

chunks.zh: 都通缩好几个月，还在这 3.95 呢
chunks.en: It's been deflationary for several months, and it's still at 3.95.
